remarks: Basic property of equivalence relations.  Compare Theorem 73 of [Suppes] p. 82.  Assumes membership of the second argument in the domain. (Contributed by NM, 30-Jul-1995.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 6-Jul-2015.)
statement:
erth2.1 $e |- ( ph -> R Er X ) $.
erth2.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. X ) $.
erth2 $p |- ( ph -> ( A R B <-> [ A ] R = [ B ] R ) ) $.
